publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1188# Mrs Mary Mulligan: Sydney Paralympics and Olympic Games-That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Paralympians and Olympians on their success at the being selected for the Sydney games and wishes the teams success in Australia.
S1M-1188# Sydney Paralympics and Olympic Games (lodged on 15 September 2000) David Mundell*, Shona Robison*
S1M-1188# Sydney Paralympics and Olympic Games (lodged on 15 September 2000) Pauline McNeill*

S1M-1188# Mrs Mary Mulligan: Sydney Paralympics and Olympic Games—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Paralympians and Olympians on their success at the being selected for the Sydney games and wishes the teams success in Australia. Supported by: David Mundell, Shona Robison, Pauline McNeill
S1M-1188# Sydney Paralympics and Olympic Games (lodged on 15 September 2000) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-1188# Sydney Paralympics and Olympic Games (lodged on 15 September 2000) Trish Godman*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-1188# Sydney Paralympics and Olympic Games (lodged on 15 September 2000) Nora Radcliffe*, Fiona McLeod*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Margaret Jamieson*
S1M-1188# Sydney Paralympics and Olympic Games (lodged on 15 September 2000) Cathy Peattie*

S1M-1188# Mrs Mary Mulligan: Sydney Paralympics and Olympic Games—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Paralympians and Olympians on their success at the being selected for the Sydney games and wishes the teams success in Australia. Supported by: David Mundell, Shona Robison, Pauline McNeill, Donald Gorrie, Trish Godman, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Nora Radcliffe, Fiona McLeod, Mr Brian Monteith, Margaret Jamieson, Cathy Peattie, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-1188# Sydney Paralympics and Olympic Games (lodged on 15 September 2000) Alex Neil*, Michael Russell*, Brian Adam*, Maureen Macmillan*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*
S1M-1188# Sydney Paralympics and Olympic Games (lodged on 15 September 2000) Irene McGugan*, Karen Whitefield*, Mr David Davidson*
S1M-1188# Sydney Paralympics and Olympic Games (lodged on 15 September 2000) Tricia Marwick*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Ms Sandra White*, Hugh Henry*

S1M-1188# Mrs Mary Mulligan: Sydney Paralympics and Olympic Games—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Paralympians and Olympians on their success at the being selected for the Sydney games and wishes the teams success in Australia. Supported by: David Mundell, Shona Robison, Pauline McNeill, Donald Gorrie, Trish Godman, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Nora Radcliffe, Fiona McLeod, Mr Brian Monteith, Margaret Jamieson, Cathy Peattie, Mr Gil Paterson, Alex Neil, Michael Russell, Brian Adam, Maureen Macmillan, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Irene McGugan, Karen Whitefield, Mr David Davidson, Tricia Marwick, Mr Jamie Stone, Ms Sandra White, Hugh Henry, Allan Wilson*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mr Duncan McNeil*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Rhoda Grant*
S1M-1188# Sydney Paralympics and Olympic Games (lodged on 15 September 2000) Mike Watson*

S1M-1188# Mrs Mary Mulligan: Sydney Paralympics and Olympic Games—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Paralympians and Olympians on their success at the being selected for the Sydney games and wishes the teams success in Australia. Supported by: David Mundell, Shona Robison, Pauline McNeill, Donald Gorrie, Trish Godman, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Nora Radcliffe, Fiona McLeod, Mr Brian Monteith, Margaret Jamieson, Cathy Peattie, Mr Gil Paterson, Alex Neil, Michael Russell, Brian Adam, Maureen Macmillan, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Irene McGugan, Karen Whitefield, Mr David Davidson, Tricia Marwick, Mr Jamie Stone, Ms Sandra White, Hugh Henry, Allan Wilson, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Mr Duncan McNeil, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Rhoda Grant, Mike Watson
S1M-1188# Sydney Paralympics and Olympic Games (lodged on 15 September 2000) Mr Kenny MacAskill*

S1M-1188# Mrs Mary Mulligan: Sydney Paralympics and Olympic Games—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Paralympians and Olympians on their success at the being selected for the Sydney games and congratulates the teams on their success in Australia. Supported by: David Mundell, Shona Robison, Pauline McNeill, Donald Gorrie, Trish Godman, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Nora Radcliffe, Fiona McLeod, Mr Brian Monteith, Margaret Jamieson, Cathy Peattie, Mr Gil Paterson, Alex Neil, Michael Russell, Brian Adam, Maureen Macmillan, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Irene McGugan, Karen Whitefield, Mr David Davidson, Tricia Marwick, Mr Jamie Stone, Ms Sandra White, Hugh Henry, Allan Wilson, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Mr Duncan McNeil, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Rhoda Grant, Mike Watson, Mr Kenny MacAskill
S1M-1188# Sydney Paralympics and Olympic Games (lodged on 15 September 2000) Scott Barrie*
